short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in feudal Japan with the breathtaking Ghost of Tsushima Live Wallpaper for your Chrome new tab! 🌸⚔️⛩️

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browsing experience with a stunning visual inspired by the epic samurai saga Ghost of Tsushima. Every new tab opens to Jin Sakai amidst a serene yet haunting landscape, embodying honor, resilience, and the spirit of the samurai. From windswept grasslands to cherry blossoms floating in the air, this wallpaper captures the artistry and emotion of Tsushima’s journey. Perfect for fans of the game’s cinematic beauty and gripping story.

This extension blends captivating visuals with seamless functionality, allowing you to explore the web while staying in Tsushima’s enchanting world.

Key Features
⚔️ Ghost of Tsushima Live Wallpaper: A tribute to Jin Sakai’s journey through a stunning feudal Japanese backdrop.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Find what you need while staying in the samurai’s world.
🕒 Clock & Date Display: Subtle timekeeping that complements the wallpaper’s aesthetic.
🔗 Customizable Site Shortcuts: Tailor your browsing experience with easy access to your favorite websites.
🔗 Quick Access Links: Lower left corner features “Remove Extension” and “More Extensions” options for convenience.
With the Ghost of Tsushima Live Wallpaper, each tab becomes a portal to a world of honor, sacrifice, and breathtaking beauty. Perfect for samurai enthusiasts and gamers alike—embrace the way of the Ghost!
